entry.title: Transference
entry.summary:
Author: murphy_stoffelis

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,770Chapters: 6/16Kudos: 57

Summary: A violent blight is sweeping through Gotham. Innocent people are suddenly being consumed by rage— with disastrous consequences. With no cure in sight, Jason finds himself working with Batman to save the city from madness.Even with his resurrection a thing of the past, an alliance with the Bats is a harrowing line between reconnecting with a former life and preserving the Red Hood's hard-won autonomy— especially when Jason's partnership with Dick Grayson begins to rekindle a past they've both tried to bury.Because in a city like Gotham, you can't trust who you love. Not even family.

entry.title: Sink In, Stay Close
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,343Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 148

Summary: Jason tilted his head. Studied the way Dick's shoulders had gone rigid, the way his breathing had gone shallow and controlled. "You good?"Dick's eyes flicked up, fast as a flinch. Blue-gray in the bad light, pupils dilated wide. Then down again, tracking the rise and fall of Jason's chest like he was counting heartbeats."Yeah," he said. But his voice sounded scraped raw. Like he'd swallowed something too big, something with edges.(Or where Jason died and came back and Dick is trying to keep him there)

entry.title: Null Signature
entry.summary:
Author: AiKotoba

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,159Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Dick Grayson has seen monsters before. He just never expected to recognize one. The pit is Gotham’s best-kept secret—an underground arena where bio-engineered beasts fight to the death, and the crowds cheer louder for blood than justice. But it’s not the monsters that pull him in. It’s the man behind one of them. Red Hood doesn’t speak much. Doesn’t take off the helmet. Doesn’t miss. He baits the deadliest creature in the ring like it’s an extension of himself—and maybe it is. Dick was only supposed to observe. Now he can’t look away. Because Wrathnir fights like someone who’s trained. Red Hood watches like someone who’s remembering. And Dick’s starting to think the thing in the cage isn’t the only ghost down here.

entry.title: False Front
entry.summary:
Author: SaviouroftheStars

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 237,799Chapters: 26/35Kudos: 651

Summary: Dick Grayson is an undercover agent, tasked with infiltrating the Red Hoods, a dangerous new gang with a strict code of ethics. Posing as Ricky Kelly, a former sex worker with a fabricated past, Dick is sent to gain the trust of their leader, the mysterious and unpredictable Red Hood. As he works his way deeper into the gang, Dick quickly realizes that the Red Hoods are unlike any other criminal organization he’s encountered—disciplined, strategic, and governed by a unique moral code.But things become complicated when Dick finds himself developing feelings for their enigmatic leader and growing closer with the people he was sent to deceive.
